actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for the exclusion from an individual's resources, in determining his or her eligibility for supplemental security income benefits, of a burial plot and of certain funds set aside for burial expenses.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to add the value of a burial plot to the items excludable from an individual's resources in determining eligibility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for the exclusion from an individual's resources, in determining his or her eligibility for supplemental security income benefits, of a burial plot and of certain funds set aside for burial expenses.
